extendedInfo.description: The Garden Time app from Burpee is the perfect tool to help gardeners know when to sow, transplant and expect to harvest vegetables and herbs specific to their garden region.  The app automatically creates a task list to notify the user when their next sow or transplant date arrives.  Included within the app is a full database of plants, local weather, and links to how-to gardening videos.Works best on Android 4.0 devices and above.  Runs on Phone and Tablet Devices.

reviews.title: Ok, but
reviews.comment: This app would be much better with a tracker. Planted this day, expected to harvest date, replant date, how to harvest, etc.
reviews.author: michael schultz

reviews.title: Does not work
reviews.comment: No fall planting sched. No winter frost end date. Shows only one veg. etc. Too much to list.
reviews.author: Jim Scott

reviews.comment: It doesn\'t work. Will not let me create a garden or use any other tabs. I have an HTC sense..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Will not allow me to create account. Does not recognize information I have entered
reviews.author: Robyn Hill

reviews.comment: The idea is there but it doesn\'t give you enough info, as well as the right info. I live in zone 9 and yet it is telling me about what to do up north. I don\'t care, to be honest. As well as I thought it would show an actual garden layout of what I had put into it, whether cartoon or real, it still would of been nice. I mean I know the creators are probably all busy trying to make money by selling burpee products and all, but y\'all really skipped out on helping ppl make great future gardens. Thanks for crap.
reviews.author: J Brown

reviews.title: Completely nonfunctional.
reviews.comment: You have to \"create a new garden\" to start, but you can\'t.
reviews.author: John Erikson

reviews.title: Unable to make garden
reviews.comment: This seems like a great idea but I cannot get the app to allow me to create a garden so I cannot use most of the features.
reviews.author: Brittany Barner

reviews.title: Can\'t create a garden
reviews.comment: Most of the location specific info is only accessed when you create a garden and I have been unable to get one created.  Uninstalling.
reviews.author: cara cole

reviews.title: And the fruit??
reviews.comment: No fruit???
reviews.author: Joscelyn Reyes

reviews.title: Lots of potential
reviews.comment: Love the garden calendar but missing a lot of products that Burpee sells. The videos don\'t work on Google Nexus 7. Would be nice if there were links to articles on the Burpee website. Fix these issues and app would be a 4-5...especially since Bonnie plants are still ignoring technology
reviews.author: Jennifer Billows

reviews.title: Very poorly designed app.
reviews.comment: You can\'t use the back button on your device. You have to scroll to the top of the screen and use the app back button. Back button often gets stuck in a loop and just keeps switching between screens. Frequently doesn\'t recognize any  button pushes. Locks up often and has to be force closed to get back into app. No alphabetical sort option for plants in garden. It\'s a list,  why can\'t we sort it? Planting times are so general as to be useless. Tells me to plant anywhere from March to June. Jeeez! I need an app to tell me that? This app needs about 6 more updates just to be usable.
reviews.author: Mike M

reviews.title: Personalized and by region
reviews.comment: Best veg garden app I\'ve found so far because it gives just need-to-know instead of all the nice-to-know info based on zip code. Thank you for the free app!!
reviews.author: Carmen Dunphy

reviews.title: Good, but...
reviews.comment: I really like the app, don\'t get me wrong, but I do have a few issues with it. First and foremost, the tomatillos I added do not show up in the tasks list. Also, I would like to see an option to add new crops or revise current crops (if you decide to start seeds indoors, for instance). Over all a good apps, does what it needs to.
reviews.author: Adam Dietrick

reviews.title: Overall ok, missing plants
reviews.comment: It is an easy-to-use app. Sometimes takes a while to refresh beds. Also, missing some main plants like strawberries, blackberries, etc. I cannot inventory my side garden beds because all I have in those are fruits. I hope that is an update at some point. Overall though a neat app that keeps me on target with optimal planting times.
reviews.author: Amy Poole

reviews.title: Hard to use
reviews.comment: This is hard to use as anything but a list of what you have. It does give an idea of when to sow but is not clear about how to tell when to harvest. Also the task is not working right and there is no help button/ area. Finally the plant types are very limited.
reviews.author: Becca Morris

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: I like this app. It does not have all of the vegetables that are offered by Burpee, but I have found the info useful for planting times and uses for unpopular herbs, like Marjoram and Lemon Balm. I recommend it.
reviews.author: Carmen Greer

reviews.title: Seriously lacking content
reviews.comment: This app could be so much more than it is. It had potential but because it has such little content (so many vegetables are missing in the database) it is very close to useless. Please update this app! I really want to use it as intended. I would definitely pay for this if it was updated.
reviews.author: Kassandria Hollis

reviews.title: Deceit!
reviews.comment: I\'ve always trusted Burpee as being an honest company. However, after d\'loading their garden app based upon their permissions, I find that in order to do anything worth having the app for you must \"register\"... Sorry Burpee, ill move on and ill also buy my seeds this year from Ferry-Morse, I don\'t like (bait and switch) methods..
reviews.author: Russell Easters

reviews.title: Absolutely Useless
reviews.comment: The concept is A ++. This app should never have been put onto the market without extensive bug fixing. You cannot choose the plants you want in your garden which is the basis for what this app DOES. I am so disappointed. Deleting app.
reviews.author: Josephine Scott

reviews.title: Basic App
reviews.comment: Videos don\'t work Need the ability to know exactly what to do when garden starts growing.  Do you add a troll or wire cone like for certain tomatoes or beans?  What the tricks are for keeping bugs and animals out.  What soil to use and how often to water.  What kind of soil can be used.  What gives the best results.  what kind of plants should or should not be planted near eachother.
reviews.author: Christine Mathes
